fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Watch (Night): See who visits your target. You may use this on even nights *once.*
-Stalk (Night): See who your target visits. You may use this on odd nights *once.*
-All-Knowing (Night): See both who your target visits and who visits them. One use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: When you die, you may use your scheduled ability once more (Watch on an odd night, Stalk on an even night). The Unseen will get your result.
